title: Research shows humans are far superior to AI on this business task
description: According to a new study, people can still be way more persuasive than artificial intelligence.
content: That’s according to a new study from the University of British Columbia’s Sauder School of Business, which found that virtual salespeople in livestreams don’t outperform humans in the same role. In fact, when interacting with consumers to promote pro... [1232 chars]

title: Anosh Ahmed, CEO of PFOAA, Presents New Industry Survey Revealing AI Adoption to Double in Financial Services by 2026
description: Dubai, UAE, Sept. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Anosh Ahmed today unveiled the results of a comprehensive new industry survey highlighting a dramatic increase in artificial intelligence (AI) adoption across the financial services sector. According to the survey, AI use in banking, insurance, fintech, and other financial services is projected to more than double by 2026, ushering in a transformative era of digital innovation.

title: What's viral Nano Banana’ AI trend? Check how to create 3D image for free in 7 easy steps
description: Nano Banana AI revolutionizes 3D figurine creation by using artificial intelligence to simplify design, modeling, and visualization. Users can customize models with AI-assisted refinements, preview designs, and export them for 3D printing, bridging the gap between imagination and reality.
